actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to survey sites associated with the relocation and internment of Japanese and Japanese-Americans during World War II, to provide for suitable identification, preservation, and interpretation of such sites, and for other purposes.
short_title: Japanese-American Relocation and Internment Site Survey Act of 1990

summary.text: Japanese-American Relocation and Internment Site Survey Act of 1990 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, with regard to certain sites associated with the relocation and internment of Japanese and Japanese-Americans during World War II, to: (1) survey such sites (including, but not limited to, civil control stations, assembly centers, and internment camps) and to provide for the site identification with the consent of the owner; and (2) enter into cooperative agreements to provide for the preservation and interpretation of such sites.

titles.title: Japanese-American Relocation and Internment Site Survey Act of 1990

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to survey sites associated with the relocation and internment of Japanese and Japanese-Americans during World War II, to provide for suitable identification, preservation, and interpretation of such sites, and for other purposes.
